hero.title: Benna Association for Orphan Care, licensed in 2010 (No. 568), supports over 4,500 orphans under the supervision of the National Center for Non-Profit Sector Development.
hero.quote: قالَ رَسُول اللَّه ﷺ: (مَا مِنْ يَوْمٍ يُصبِحُ العِبادُ فِيهِ إِلَّا مَلَكَانِ يَنْزِلانِ، فَيَقُولُ أَحَدُهُمَا: اللَّهُمَّ أَعْطِ مُنْفِقًا خَلَفًا، وَيَقُولُ الآخَرُ: اللَّهُمَّ أَعْطِ مُمْسِكًا تَلَفًا)

footer.title: Benna Association for Orphan Care, License No. 568

contactPage.description: We are happy to receive your message, whether it is an inquiry, a suggestion, or a complaint. Your message will be answered through the mobile number you provide. May Allah reward you and make you among the companions of the Prophet ﷺ.

moyasarErrors.INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS: The card doesn't have sufficient funds to complete the transaction
moyasarErrors.DECLINED: Transaction declined by the customer's bank. The customer should use an alternate credit card
moyasarErrors.BLOCKED: The acquiring bank blocked the transaction without specifying the reason, could be suspected of fraud
moyasarErrors.EXPIRED_TRANSACTION: The payment process took too long (more than 15 minutes) and then failed
moyasarErrors.UNSPECIFIED_FAILURE: The customer's bank has declined the transaction for an undefined cause in their system
moyasarErrors.EXPIRED_CARD: The transaction failed as the card appears to have expired
moyasarErrors.TIMED_OUT: The customer's bank was unable to be connected. The customer should attempt to process this transaction again
moyasarErrors.INVALID_SECURITY_CODE: The security number (CVC/CVV) was entered incorrectly by the cardholder
moyasarErrors.REFERRED: The customer's bank has indicated there is a problem with the credit card number
moyasarErrors.AUTHENTICATION_FAILED: Authentication is unsuccessful or not attempted by the cardholder
moyasarErrors.VISA_NOT_SUPPORTED: The merchant account is not configured to receive Visa transactions
moyasarErrors.MASTERCARD_NOT_SUPPORTED: The merchant account is not configured to receive MasterCard transactions
moyasarErrors.CARD_NOT_ENROLLED: The card was not listed 3D-Secure with the issuing bank. Contact your bank to activate the card for online payment
moyasarErrors.DEFAULT: An error occurred while processing the payment, please try again
